long_description: Casual comfort meets bold, colorblock style. The Postcard Cardigan from Horny Toad is a lightweight layer you can wear at the park, out to dinner and anywhere in between. Linen/cotton blend fabric is naturally soft, lightweight and breathable. The Horny Toad Postcard Cardigan features an open cardigan front without closure; colorblock sleeves; front drop-in pockets.
short_description: Casual comfort meets bold, colorblock style. The Postcard Cardigan from Horny Toad is a lightweight layer you can wear at the park, out to dinner and anywhere in between.
